Text.Page:
Have you seen the giant spiders to the north? They're terrifying! And nobody can agree on how they came to be.

Did Killian grow them? Or did he simply corrupt them?

I'm not sure, but I do worry about Allemantheia and Eleneaâ€”they're closest and if the spiders got loose, those would be the first places they'd go.

If you're not afraid of spiders, you should go kill them before they can attack.

Thanks, !

Oh, and for the record...I'm not afraid of spiders, either. At all. I just, uh...I didn't want to. That's all.
